<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Scout Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=6394) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=535" />
<trait label="Dedication" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=572" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 212 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Archetype** [Scout](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=261)

**Prerequisites**
Trained in [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=48); Trained in [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=49)

</column>

---

You are a highly skilled scout, capable of guiding your allies, detecting imminent threats, and avoiding the attention of dangerous enemies. You can perform the [Scout](/Actions.aspx?ID=2629) exploration activity at the same time as the [Avoid Notice](/Actions.aspx?ID=2622) exploration activity. The bonus to initiative you grant when you Scout is +2 instead of +1.

<title level="2">Scout Dedication leads to...</title>
[Fleeting Shadow](/Feats.aspx?ID=6397), [Scout's Charge](/Feats.aspx?ID=6395), [Scout's Pounce](/Feats.aspx?ID=6399), [Scout's Speed](/Feats.aspx?ID=6398), [Terrain Scout](/Feats.aspx?ID=6396)
name: Scout Dedication
prerequisite: Trained in Stealth; Trained in Survival
